sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react' import Context from '../store/context'; import { Button, FormGroup, Label, Input, FormText, Container, Form, Row, Col } from 'reactstrap'; import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css"; import UserContext from '../store/context'; const CreateAccount = () => { var title = "Login: "; // user can create an account successfully const context = useContext(UserContext); if (context.loggedIn) { return (

Thank you for joining, {context.userName}!

Welcome to Kreative Zings!

); } else { return (

{context.userName}

Enter information below to join the family!



(title = e.target.value)} type="text" />
); } } export default CreateAccount;
